subject: Lockouts
Arbitration, Conciliation and Mediation
Football
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. and its players union met for the fourth day, providing a glimmer of hope that progress toward a labor deal is possible before a March 3 deadline.
snippet: The N.F.L. and its players union met for the fourth day, providing a glimmer of hope that progress toward a labor deal is possible before a March 3 deadline.
